summary: Comprehensive testing of AI Companion web app completed. All features working: Google OAuth redirect, email/password signup & login, characters API with category filtering, chat with AI responses, voice generation integration. 19/19 backend tests passed. All UI flows tested successfully.
passed_tests: POST /api/chat/send sends message and gets AI response
UI: Auth page loads with Google Sign-in button
UI: Email/Password signup form with username input
UI: Signup redirects to characters page
UI: Login redirects to characters page
UI: Google Sign-in redirects to auth.emergentagent.com
UI: Category switcher navigates to Anime (8 characters)
UI: Category switcher navigates to Guys (7 characters)
UI: Click on character card navigates to chat page
UI: Chat page has message input, send button, image button
UI: Send message shows user message and AI response
UI: Voice button appears on AI messages
UI: Back button navigates to characters page
UI: Landing page displays with proper branding and CTAs
UI: Logout redirects to auth page
seed_data_creation: Test users created with TEST_ prefix during API testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: All core features tested and working. Backend uses EMERGENT_LLM_KEY for AI features (chat via Gemini 3 Flash, voice via OpenAI TTS). Google OAuth via Emergent Auth is configured and redirects properly. 25 characters across Girls (10), Anime (8), Guys (7) categories.
